name: Layer
description: Creates an AWS OpsWorks layer. A layer defines, for example, which packages and applications are installed and how they are configured.

properties.name: Attributes
properties.description: One or more user-defined key-value pairs to be added to the stack attributes bag.

properties.name: AutoAssignElasticIps
properties.description: Whether to automatically assign an Elastic IP address to Amazon EC2 instances in this layer.

properties.name: AutoAssignPublicIps
properties.description: For AWS OpsWorks stacks that are running in a VPC, whether to automatically assign a public IP address to Amazon EC2 instances in this layer.

properties.name: CustomInstanceProfileArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM instance profile that is to be used for the Amazon EC2 instances in this layer.

properties.name: CustomRecipes
properties.description: Custom event recipes for this layer.

properties.name: CustomSecurityGroupIds
properties.description: Custom security group IDs for this layer.

properties.name: EnableAutoHealing
properties.description: Whether to automatically heal Amazon EC2 instances that have become disconnected or timed out.

properties.name: InstallUpdatesOnBoot
properties.description: Whether to install operating system and package updates when the instance boots.

properties.name: LifecycleEventConfiguration
properties.description: The lifecycle events for the AWS OpsWorks layer.

properties.name: LoadBasedAutoScaling
properties.description: The load-based scaling configuration for the AWS OpsWorks layer.

properties.name: Shortname
properties.description: The layer short name, which is used internally by AWS OpsWorks and by Chef recipes. The short name is also used as the name for the directory where your app files are installed.

properties.name: StackId
properties.description: The ID of the AWS OpsWorks stack that this layer will be associated with.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: The layer type. A stack cannot have more than one layer of the same type, except for the custom type. You can have any number of custom types. For more information, see CreateLayer in the AWS OpsWorks API Reference.

properties.name: VolumeConfigurations
properties.description: Describes the Amazon EBS volumes for this layer.
